title: 夜は猫といっしょ Season2

search.overview: 拖着疲惫的身子回到家的夜晚，想和猫咪一起度过。风太的家中突然多了一只猫咪「咕噜加」。与咕噜加的共同生活充满了奇妙和快乐的事！描绘了与猫咪的真实日常生活的人气猫咪漫画，终于要在今夏推出动画版！
search.name: 与猫共度的夜晚

search.overview: Heizo Endo, a “night-walking cat” who calls out to those who cry in the night town. The cat cries, laughs, encourages, and sometimes encourages the people who shed tears as it continues to walk through the night.
search.name: Yomawari Neko

title: ハートカクテル カラフル

search.original_name: ハートカクテル カラフル
search.overview: "Heart Cocktail Colorful is based on Seizou Watase's Heart Cocktail manga, which Watase wrote in the 1980s and has 11 volumes. The full color manga told love stories set in urban environments. The new manga will continue to tell love stories, but will take place in the present day. Some of the stories will include a love story with an age difference, a love story between two people who cannot meet due to the pandemic, and the love of a single mother."
search.name: ハートカクテル カラフル
